name: sambar
content:
Add to word list

a dish made with lentils (= very small dried beans that are cooked and eaten) that is popular in South India and Sri Lanka: Serve the dosa with piping hot sambar and coconut chutney. Lunch and dinner typically include rice, two vegetables and a spicy lentil dish called sambar.
More examplesFewer examplesThe vegetables added to the dal give a different taste to the sambar.Make sure that the tamarind juice is thick because that is what decides how thick your sambar will be.Idli hot from the steamer and a bowl of spicy sambar is one of my favourite dishes.
